channel.title: How to un-null items
channel.description:
So i am using the evolutoin X client and i tried to add chaotics to my server. I put it in my shops and i stuck this in the items.cfg item = 15037 Chaotic_rapier A_very_poweful_rapier. 40000 600000000 (i cutt off the rest of the stuff i didnt want to makeit so long.
and theni put it in my shop with a bunch of other chaotic stuff and they all came out as nulls how do i take the null off of it>=

item.title: How to un-null items
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

[quote=“underdrive, post:7, topic:367613”]Ok i have class8 i am guessing im supposed to take somehting liek thsi and edit it change the numbers and such?
if(i == 9807)
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;
class8.anInt174 = 14017;
class8.anInt181 = 720;
class8.anInt190 = 28;
class8.anInt198 = 0;
class8.anInt194 = 1;
class8.anInt169 = 1;
class8.anInt204 = 0;
class8.anInt165 = 14018;
class8.anInt200 = 14019;
class8.aString170 = “Zuriel’s Hood”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “Zuriel’s Hood, a reward from PVP.”.getBytes();[/quote]

Take a look at SilentCj’s TuT on models http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363483.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: How to un-null items
item.dc:creator: @k_a_h_leader Aeolian
item.description:
@k_a_h_leader wrote:

You need to add the model and the configuration for that model (In class8.java or ItemDef.java depending if you’re using renamed or non-renamed).

You only added the configurations server-sided which doesn’t tell the client exactly what the item is. You need to manually add that item into the client so that the client recognizes it. Otherwise it’ll just be a nulled item.

Read full topic
